text:
Hey Folks,
I am facing issue in search result page
when I enter "HubSpot" it has totally 3 result but after that it showing extra result is that issue in HubSpot search result page

Hey folks, I thought this was simple but I am stuck :thinking_face:
• I have a custom field "birthday" at the contact defined (date) 
• I want a dashboard showing the next upcoming birthdays
What I tried
• have a workflow set the next birthday date -> no calculation possible
• use calculation fields on the contact entity -> not enough flexibility to calculate this
Any ideas? :slightly_smiling_face:
